BEGIN_NAMESPACE_GIS_GEOMETRY
public __gc __interface 		IPolygon
 The GisIPolygon class is a polygon Geometry type. GisIPolygon is defined by one exterior boundary and zero or more interior boundaries. Each of the boundaries must be a closed, simple LinearRing.
